author: Special Correspondent
text:
Governor K. Rosaiah inaugurated the 31st India International Leather Fair (IILF), at Chennai Trade Centre on Sunday.

More than 456 exhibitors from India and abroad are taking part in the fair. L.C. Goyal, chairman and managing director, India Trade Promotion Organisation, and M. Rafeeque Ahmed, chairman, Council for Leather Exports, were among others present on the occasion. An official note said that over the years, these events have grown in size, magnitude, style and recognition among the global trade community.
title: Leather fair begins
